texts:
{"title":"Thanks for downloading @GAME_NAME","intro_thanks":"Privacy is very important to Loom Games.

We need your permission to use your data and provide you with a personalized experience.

With your consent, Loom and its partners will collect technical data points including your advertising identifier and IP address in order to offer you a unique gaming experience and keep improving our games (see our Privacy Policy).","pgpd_sixteen":"I certify that I’m over the age of sixteen, and have read, understood and accepted Loom’s Privacy Policy.","consent_advertising":"Serve you with personalised advertising","consent_analytics":"Measure content performance and improve Loom games and applications","outro_thanks":"These information will specifically be collected by Loom and its partners for the following purposes:","play":"Start playing","more":"Learn more","title2":"Make @GAME_NAME better and keep it free!","intro2":"Thank you for downloading our game! Did you know that sharing your data is the best way for you to enjoy a unique gaming experience and to help us improve? You can decide at any time to remove your consent via this or any Loom application by clicking the dedicated settings button.
Here's why data is collected by this application:","game":"To generate statistics about your game usage, including the number of games played and game length, which allow us to improve your gaming experience.","bug":"To solve technical issues.","ads":"To understand your interests and to offer you targeted advertisements that are more relevant to you (including in particular billing activities for display services, capping and attribution).","outro2":"If you do not wish to share your personal data for use as described in our Privacy Policy, you will continue to have access to our applications. Your experience might differ and include a larger volume of non-targeted advertising (see our Privacy Policy).","partners":"Our partners","data_sharing":"Setting up information sharing","intro3":"You can choose the data you wish to share:","intro_partners":"You can learn more below about the partners we work with for Advertising purposes, and for Support and Analytics purposes.","analytics":"Support and Analytics","advertising":"Advertising","confirm":"Save my choices","back":"Back","access_data":"Access or modify my data","delete_data":"Delete all my data","privacy_policy_url":"https://docs.google.com/document/d/15VGqhhR-lgEF0ABA8SZ4ov2p0eRKjG1O2VGRLfyR4TU/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.weisiih5a5tn","privacy_policy":"Privacy policy","close":"Close","email":"Email","send":"Send request","intro4":"By law you are entitled to access or modify any data that we store.","intro_delete":"If you would like all the data Loom has ever collected on you to become unusable, we encourage you to reset your IDFA or GAID.","error_title":"Error","success_title":"Success","success":"Your request has been registered.","error":"An error occurred, please try again later.","idfa":"IDFA or GAID","idfv":"IDFV","data_sharing_subtitle":"You asked the app when it was installed not to track your activities in other companies' apps and sites as part of Apple's App Tracking Transparency (ATT). Loom does not collect your advertising identifier (IDFA), but may still, with your consent, collect other data for advertising and analytical purposes. You can select the purposes for sharing your data:"}
